text: kaho, "kya tumane unako dekha bhee, jinhen tum allaah ko chhodakar pukaarate ho? mujhe dikhao unhonne dharatee kee cheezon mein se kya paida kiya hai ya aakaashon mein unakee koee saajhedaaree hai? mere paas isase pahale kee koee kitaab le aao ya gyaan kee koee avashesh baat hee, yadi tum sachche ho.
